title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Park Fun
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun               Park Fun       Ever wonder why most of the pictures of the Klondike Gold Rush are in black and white? Color photography wasn't yet invented and wouldn't become popular till nearly 50 years later...And those color pictures you do see of the gold rush?  Those pictures have been colored by either hand or computer.  Not really color photographs! Now you can color your own gold rush artwork and determine what colors the stampeders wore and saw.    Â        click on this image for a page to color at home   Color your own Klondike Scene on the following pages.
